refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert a “DIagrams Through ASCII Art” diagram into an image

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This step converts ditaa diagrams into PNG images. The step returns a base64 encoded data: URI.
If the html option is true, an HTML img is returned, otherwise a c:data element that contains the URI is returned.
